scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises oversized letters written to John Wesley Hunt from business associates related to the purchase of a boat as well as letters from Hunt's parents and brothers in Pennsylvania discussing his dissolved partnership with Harry Heth and expressing disapproval of his new partnership and business in Norfolk, Virginia. Copies of these letters are stored in Box 1, Folder 4 along with other materials from 1794.
